blogPost.excerpt: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
blogPost.body: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
blogPost.title: ClaySQL - Run SQL queries directly in Google Sheets
blogPost.author: Jordan Banafsheha

localize.description: 将您的SQL数据库连接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查询结果。告别在SQL编辑器、CSV下载、Excel和Dashboards之间跳来跳去。让你的财务模型、增长图表和客户名单始终保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中运行SQL查询

localize.description: 將您的SQL數據庫連接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查詢結果。告別在SQL編輯器、CSV下載、Excel和Dashboards之間跳來跳去。讓你的財務模型、增長圖表和客戶名單始終保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中運行SQL查詢

previous.excerpt: Do what matters most. Daily Four is all about getting the important things done with minimal stress. Reflect on your past achievements whenever you need a dose of perspective.
previous.title: Daily Four - Do what matters most

localize.description: 做最重要的事。每日四点就是要用最小的压力完成重要的事情。每当你需要透视的时候，就反思一下你过去的成就。

localize.description: GoCopy是一款AI写作助手。我们用AI驱动的写作工具增强您的创作过程。告别写作障碍，让您的创作灵感源源不断。
GoCopy是一款AI寫作助手。我們用AI驅動的寫作工具增強您的創作過程。告別寫作障礙，讓您的創作靈感源源不斷。
